back.image: Small images from Philadelphia.> The Cradle of Liberty. Independence Hall, Philadelphia Pa.
back.text: Aug 9, 1907. 8 AM. Will leave here at 10:25 for Columbus. Travelled all night last night. Will get home tomorrow morning if nothing prevents. I am a sad boy. I do not know what is in store for me at home. I pray that all will be well but am prepared for the worst.
